name: Weapon Retention Drills
description: Training in securing melee weapons during combat and preventing disarmament.

cards.title: Grip Strength and Weapon Control
cards.description: Developing grip endurance and hand control to prevent weapon loss.
cards.bulletpoints: Strength drills, grip adjustment techniques, counter-disarm maneuvers
cards.summaryText: Build crushing grip endurance, cycle choke, hammer, and saber grip adjustments, and snap into counters the second someone clamps your weapon hand.

cards.title: Retention in Close Quarters
cards.description: Defending against disarmament attempts in grappling range.
cards.bulletpoints: Body positioning, leverage advantage, reactive counters
cards.summaryText: Lock the weapon to your centerline, crash hips into the attacker, cycle leverage breaks, and chain reactive strikes to punish every disarm attempt in the clinch.
